data.name: Taboo Tattoo: In the Palm of the Hand
data.short_description: The battle against the Kingdom at the ruins in America intensifies, with Izzy and Tamaki fighting Brahman members to the death so that Justice and Tom can move forward. Meanwhile, as Justice heads for the ruins to stop Arya, Cal stands in his path, made even stronger after her defeat by BB.
data.supported_languages:
English*, Japanese
*languages with full audio support
